title: Ose
data:
**Ose, Dreamer in a Drowned City** is a [spirit](/wiki/Spirits_\(dNetHack\) "Spirits (dNetHack)") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Ritual, seal and taboo](#Ritual.2C_seal_and_taboo)

- [2 Mark](#Mark)

- [3 Benefits](#Benefits)

- [4 As a monster](#As_a_monster)

  - [4.1 Generation](#Generation)
  - [4.2 Strategy](#Strategy)

- [5 Encyclopedia entry](#Encyclopedia_entry)

## Ritual, seal and taboo

Ose's seal must be drawn underwater, and can only be addressed by a submerged character - the water is drained away as part of the ritual. Her seal may be drawn and used on dry land in the Lost Cities.

To keep Ose bound, you must not fall into water.

## Mark

Your gaze carries tangible weight, and its force can be felt from a distance. You can hide this effect by [blinding](/wiki/Blind "Blind") yourself or wearing a [metallic](/wiki/Metallic "Metallic") [helm](/wiki/Helm "Helm") that is not a [helm of telepathy](/wiki/Helm_of_telepathy "Helm of telepathy"). For all characters except [Wizards](/wiki/Wizards "Wizards") and [incantifiers](/wiki/Incantifier "Incantifier"), a [cornuthaum](/wiki/Cornuthaum "Cornuthaum") will work as well.

## Benefits

While bound, Ose confers [immunity to death effects](/wiki/Death_resistance "Death resistance") and grants skill in [tridents](/wiki/Trident "Trident").

Ose's active powers are as follows:

- **Querient Thoughts**: You release a blast of psychic static that damages all [telepathic](/wiki/Telepathic "Telepathic") monsters on the level, and can also damage non-telepathic monsters with a 1‚ÅÑ5 chance of occurring for each monster.
- **Great Leap**: You [level teleport](/wiki/Level_teleport "Level teleport") at the cost of 625 [nutrition](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition").

Ose's passive powers are as follows:

- **Plain Leap**: You can [jump](/wiki/Jump "Jump").
- **Maddening Thoughts**: You gain a bonus to certain weapons based on your [insight](/wiki/Insight "Insight"), as if you were a [Madman](/wiki/Madman "Madman").
- **Opened Mind**: You cast spells using your [Charisma](/wiki/Charisma "Charisma") score.

## As a monster

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                  |
| Ose:* can [fly](/wiki/Fly "Fly").
* can [survive underwater](/wiki/Amphibious "Amphibious").
* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* can [see invisible creatures](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is an [overlord to its kind](/wiki/M2_PRINCE "M2 PRINCE").
* is female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can [follow](/wiki/Follower "Follower") you to other levels.
* is [nasty](/wiki/M2_NASTY "M2 NASTY").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless").
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                                                                                  |

In notdNetHack, **Ose**, @, also appears as a [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that can be summoned by an [Illithanachronounbinder](/wiki/Illithanachronounbinder "Illithanachronounbinder"). Ose is a [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral") [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)") that is [amphibious](/wiki/Amphibious "Amphibious"), [unbreathing](/wiki/Unbreathing "Unbreathing"), [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong"), and is an [overlord](/wiki/Overlord "Overlord") to her kind; she can [see invisible](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible"), is capable of [flight](/wiki/Flight "Flight"), will pick up and collect items, and can [follow](/wiki/Follow "Follow") you to other levels if she is adjacent to you.

Ose has a weapon attack, a [sleep](/wiki/Sleep "Sleep")-inducing [breath](/wiki/Breath "Breath") attack and a claw attack that can splash targets with [Lethe water](/wiki/Lethe_water "Lethe water"), and possesses [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance"), [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance") and [stoning resistance](/wiki/Stoning_resistance "Stoning resistance"). She cannot be tamed.

### Generation

Ose is first generated when summoned from her seal by an Illithanachronounbinder. She is always created hostile, and is not a valid form for normal [polymorph](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph").

Ose is generated with a +9 [misty](/wiki/Object_properties#dNetHack "Object properties") [mithril](/wiki/Mithril "Mithril") [trident](/wiki/Trident "Trident"), [high-elven gauntlets](/index.php?title=High-elven_gauntlets\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "High-elven gauntlets (page does not exist)"), [high-elven plate](/index.php?title=High-elven_plate\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "High-elven plate (page does not exist)"), a [high-elven helm](/index.php?title=High-elven_helm\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "High-elven helm (page does not exist)"), and a [shield of reflection](/wiki/Shield_of_reflection "Shield of reflection").

Ose [does not leave a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless") upon death.

### Strategy

**Below this point, there are major spoilers for the Illithanachronounbinder role.** They can be accessed by selecting the "Role spoiler" tab.

[x][ ]

- Strategy
- Role spoiler

Ose's natural 14 points of [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") (or -4) is further bolstered by the high-elven armor she wears, and the [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection") from her shield makes several types of [ray](/wiki/Ray "Ray") attacks ineffective. She can also move at 15 [speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed") and has the maximum [MR score](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)") of 100.

If Ose is killed after being summoned, she can be encountered again in the [Void](/index.php?title=Void\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Void (page does not exist)"), a branch accessed by opening the high [altar](/wiki/Altar "Altar") of [Ilsensine the Fallen](/wiki/Ilsensine_the_Fallen "Ilsensine the Fallen") as an Illithanachronounbinder using the [invoke](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") effect of [The Elder Cerebral Fluid](/wiki/The_Elder_Cerebral_Fluid "The Elder Cerebral Fluid"). Ose is placed randomly along with many other spirits of the near void on the second floor of the branch, and is generated with the "whispers" template, which makes her [nonliving](/wiki/Nonliving "Nonliving").

## Encyclopedia entry

Long, long ago, before your ancestors had discovered flint or fire or songs, my people were already climbing the great heights of civilization. Settling on an island in the midst of the lonely seas, we raised a great city to the stars.  
  
...But Time sweeps away all things, and that shining city has long since drowned beneath the uncaring ocean.

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Ose

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Ose, Dreamer in a Drowned City is a spirit that appears in dNetHack and notdNetHack.

Contents

  • 1 Ritual, seal and taboo
  • 2 Mark
  • 3 Benefits
  • 4 As a monster
    • 4.1 Generation
    • 4.2 Strategy
  • 5 Encyclopedia entry

Ritual, seal and taboo

Ose's seal must be drawn underwater, and can only be addressed by a submerged character - the water is drained away as part of the ritual. Her seal may be drawn and used on dry land in the Lost Cities.

To keep Ose bound, you must not fall into water.

Mark

Your gaze carries tangible weight, and its force can be felt from a distance. You can hide this effect by blinding yourself or wearing a metallic helm that is not a helm of telepathy. For all characters except Wizards and incantifiers, a cornuthaum will work as well.

Benefits

While bound, Ose confers immunity to death effects and grants skill in tridents.

Ose's active powers are as follows:

  • Querient Thoughts: You release a blast of psychic static that damages all telepathic monsters on the level, and can also damage non-telepathic monsters with a 1⁄5 chance of occurring for each monster.
  • Great Leap: You level teleport at the cost of 625 nutrition.

Ose's passive powers are as follows:

  • Plain Leap: You can jump.
  • Maddening Thoughts: You gain a bonus to certain weapons based on your insight, as if you were a Madman.
  • Opened Mind: You cast spells using your Charisma score.

As a monster

@ Ose File:Ose the Dreamer.png
Difficulty 40
Attacks Weapon 3d8 physical, breath 3d8 sleep, claw 1d3 splash with lethe water
@ Ose File:Ose the Dreamer.png
Difficulty 40
Attacks

Weapon 3d8 physical, breath 3d8 sleep, claw 1d3 splash with lethe water

Base level 35
Base experience 2009
Speed 15
Base AC -4
Base MR 100
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances fire, poison, petrification

Ose:

  • can fly.
  • can survive underwater.
  • does not breathe.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is an overlord to its kind.
  • is female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • cannot be tamed.

In notdNetHack, Ose, @, also appears as a monster that can be summoned by an Illithanachronounbinder. Ose is a neutral human that is amphibious, unbreathing, strong, and is an overlord to her kind; she can see invisible, is capable of flight, will pick up and collect items, and can follow you to other levels if she is adjacent to you.

Ose has a weapon attack, a sleep-inducing breath attack and a claw attack that can splash targets with Lethe water, and possesses fire resistance, poison resistance and stoning resistance. She cannot be tamed.

Generation

Ose is first generated when summoned from her seal by an Illithanachronounbinder. She is always created hostile, and is not a valid form for normal polymorph.

Ose is generated with a +9 misty mithril trident, high-elven gauntlets, high-elven plate, a high-elven helm, and a shield of reflection.

Ose does not leave a corpse upon death.

Strategy

Below this point, there are major spoilers for the Illithanachronounbinder role. They can be accessed by selecting the "Role spoiler" tab.

Ose's natural 14 points of AC (or -4) is further bolstered by the high-elven armor she wears, and the reflection from her shield makes several types of ray attacks ineffective. She can also move at 15 speed and has the maximum MR score of 100.

If Ose is killed after being summoned, she can be encountered again in the Void, a branch accessed by opening the high altar of Ilsensine the Fallen as an Illithanachronounbinder using the invoke effect of The Elder Cerebral Fluid. Ose is placed randomly along with many other spirits of the near void on the second floor of the branch, and is generated with the "whispers" template, which makes her nonliving.

Encyclopedia entry

Long, long ago, before your ancestors had discovered flint or fire or songs, my people were already climbing the great heights of civilization. Settling on an island in the midst of the lonely seas, we raised a great city to the stars.

...But Time sweeps away all things, and that shining city has long since drowned beneath the uncaring ocean.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Ose&oldid=160567"

rawPage:
'''Ose, Dreamer in a Drowned City''' is a [[Spirits (dNetHack)|spirit]] that appears in [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]].

==Ritual, seal and taboo==
Ose's seal must be drawn underwater, and can only be addressed by a submerged character - the water is drained away as part of the ritual. Her seal may be drawn and used on dry land in the Lost Cities.

To keep Ose bound, you must not fall into water.

==Mark==
Your gaze carries tangible weight, and its force can be felt from a distance. You can hide this effect by [[blind]]ing yourself or wearing a [[metallic]] [[helm]] that is not a [[helm of telepathy]]. For all characters except [[Wizards]] and [[incantifier]]s, a [[cornuthaum]] will work as well.

==Benefits==
While bound, Ose confers [[Death resistance|immunity to death effects]] and grants skill in [[trident]]s.

Ose's active powers are as follows:

* '''Querient Thoughts''': You release a blast of psychic static that damages all [[telepathic]] monsters on the level, and can also damage non-telepathic monsters with a {{frac|5}} chance of occurring for each monster.
* '''Great Leap''': You [[level teleport]] at the cost of 625 [[nutrition]].

Ose's passive powers are as follows:

* '''Plain Leap''': You can [[jump]].
* '''Maddening Thoughts''': You gain a bonus to certain weapons based on your [[insight]], as if you were a [[Madman]].
* '''Opened Mind''': You cast spells using your [[Charisma]] score.

In notdNetHack, '''Ose''', {{brightblue|@}}, also appears as a [[monster]] that can be summoned by an [[Illithanachronounbinder]]. Ose is a [[neutral]] [[Human (monster attribute)|human]] that is [[amphibious]], [[unbreathing]], [[strong]], and is an [[overlord]] to her kind; she can [[see invisible]], is capable of [[flight]], will pick up and collect items, and can [[follow]] you to other levels if she is adjacent to you.

Ose has a weapon attack, a [[sleep]]-inducing [[breath]] attack and a claw attack that can splash targets with [[Lethe water]], and possesses [[fire resistance]], [[poison resistance]] and [[stoning resistance]]. She cannot be tamed.

===Generation===
Ose is first generated when summoned from her seal by an Illithanachronounbinder. She is always created hostile, and is not a valid form for normal [[polymorph]].

Ose is generated with a +9 [[Object properties#dNetHack|misty]] [[mithril]] [[trident]], [[high-elven gauntlets]], [[high-elven plate]], a [[high-elven helm]], and a [[shield of reflection]].

Ose [[Corpseless|does not leave a corpse]] upon death.

Ose is placed randomly along with many other spirits of the near void on the second floor of the branch, and is generated with the "whispers" template, which makes her [[nonliving]].
